page.normal_text:
aimed at describing in great detail the day to day practices of conducting gene therapy clinical trials at 3 clinical research sites in academic medical centers with a maximum of 12 interviews at each site for a total of 36 interviews with research staff, clinical staff, patients and relatives. There were 4 informed consents and 3 interview guides.
